unnormalised: Bore, konnem vicharlem Emergency Room-ant *khorem* koxem asta mhunn, ho? Hanv tuka sangtam, tem "Grey's Anatomy" itlem nhoi ani "caffeine-an zoddlelem dondoll" zaitem asa. Tunvem dekhunk melltolim vostu, tim tujje dolleantlean kadunk zaina, toxem to munis zannem taka dislem to tacho samosa thoddo *zaiteach* utsavachea bhareant talunk zata, vo ti aunty zannem apleach saree-cher adhorlean lagimch bollivudacho star film kortana dekhunk dhavtana. Amchea koden ek kes asli pattlea satolleant kiteak zalear konnachen doxim dukhlem Naagin che zaite episode dekhlea uprant. Dr. Sharma thoddoch urlo aplea chaier hansun gut'tollean.
normalised: Bore, konnem vicharlem Emergency Room-ant khorench koxem asta mhunn, hã? Hanv sangtam, tem “Grey’s Anatomy” bhaxen nhoi, punn “caffeine-an coordinated kel’lem chaos”. Tum tankam polloyunk xokona toxem tum polloytele, to monis zannem aple samose thode zaitoch ut’tom deep-fry korunk sanglem, vo ti aunty zannem lagim film korpi ek Bollywood star pollovnk poddlem. Amchea kodden ek case astali zantun konnachen N-A-A-G-I-Nache zaitoch episodes pollelea uprant dokhe dukhta mhunn complain korunk ailo. Doctor Sharma aple chayen hansun umkalleun ghelo.

unnormalised: Gam'bhirponnan, tem ek rollercoaster asa. Ek minut tunv ek bhurgeak stich korchom zannem aplem gutton kaddlem aplea baapachea Bajaj scooter-antlean poddun, dusrea minute tunv sodchom koxem Mr. Gupta-n ek cricketacho ball kithench ravlo zoxem suryo dekhona. Uprant, tunv ek patient-achea kodan coding kortelim zannen 14/02/2024 hea disak heart attack hadlem (Valentine's Day, sogllea disanchem!). Ani hoy, ami *kartat* te fency doctorachea utranchem tem tunv TV-cher polheta. Kednam tori "pneumonoultramicroscopicsilicovolcanoconiosis" uloitolam 36 ghodde jagrut ravlea uprant? Borem zavo tuzo, dost.
normalised: Seriously punn, tem ek rollercoaster. Ek minut tum ek bhurgeak sut up korunk asta zannem aple bapachi B-A-J-A-J scooterek denvun ghaslem, dusrea minutant tum Mister Guptak cricket ball suryek disona tedna koxem ataplem mhunn sodunk try korta. Magir, tum ek patientak code korta zannem fourteenth February don hazar ani vis chovisaver heart attack ailo (Valentine's Day, soglleam dinachem!). Ani hoi, ami ti fancy medical terms vaparta zankam tum T-V-ant pollehta. Konnacho “pneumonoultramicroscopicsilicovolcanoconiosis” thirty six horan jivacho astana pronounce korunk try kelam? Tumak bori sukrut, buddy.

unnormalised: Punn hanso soddun dilear, tem khub molachem asa. Tuka ek khorem antar korunk mellta, tori tem ek lhan kapdak patti bandun vo konak sangun kiteak, tankam ER-ak dhavunk zai na kiteak zalear tacho naan thoddoch chirmullo asa. Tem ek khoreponnan lojjek nastam lokanche sangata ravun, ani chodda tem lokanchea sangata hansun kiteak zalear tankam khub murkh kaam korun asa. Mhaka vichar naka ideal dosage Crocin-achea 3:00 AM-ak – Google zanna.
normalised: Punn jokes aside, tem khub rewarding. Tum ek khorench difference korunk mellta, tum ek minor cut sut up korunk vo konnek sanglem tori ami E-R-ak rush korunk zai na kiteak tankachim naan thodi jholleun geli. Tem tankanchim worst moments-ant lokanchea khatir astana ani, kednam kednam, tankam sangata hansunk kiteak tankam zaitoch murkh kelam tedna. Tum mhaka thinn’ttayank Crocinchem ideal dosage kitea mhunn vichar naka three zero zero A-M-ak – Google-ak khobor asa.
